entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early this morning then changing to rain this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of drizzle later this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning near midnight and ending before morning then 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
